prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon with a sleek, serpentine body and glowing accents.
Imagine a mythical creature that combines elements of darkness and powerful energy.
Design an intimidating Pokemon that features sharp spikes and a vibrant color scheme.
Show me a legendary Pokemon characterized by its unique dual-type abilities and massive wings.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies both power and mystery with a striking appearance.
Give me a creature that thrives in urban environments, with a design that reflects chaos.
Make a Pokemon that represents the fusion of dragon and ghost types with dark elements.
